DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate addition quality improvement toolbox online audit feedback intervention Dutch intensive care unit . The toolbox comprise quality indicator ( e.g. , percentage patient per shift whose pain measure ) list potential bottleneck care process ( e.g. , staff unaware prevail guideline measure pain every shift ) , associate recommendation action solve mention bottleneck ( e.g. , organize educational training session ) , support material facilitate implementation action ( e.g. , slide show presentation discuss importance relevance measure pain every shift ) . Half participate intensive care unit receive online feedback , half additionally gain access integrate toolbox facilitate planning execute action .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effectiveness Audit Feedback Intervention With Quality Improvement Toolbox Intensive Care
DOC.criteria: ICUs treat adult ( 18 year ) patient ICUs willing able submit data monthly ICUs local quality improvement team least 1 intensivist 1 nurse
